Name: Diamond - Bulwark 5
Description: Embedding gems into gear can endow the gear with the unique effects contained in the gems.
Description$english: Embedding gems into gear can endow the gear with the unique effects contained in the gems.
Description2$english: Refined gem produced through expert Gemcrafting processing of raw crystal materials. Perfect cutting technique creates a unique energy resonance chamber that multiplies inherent energy while adding new properties.

recipes.Name: Diamond - Bulwark 5
recipes.Des: Used for gear embedding, grants the gear a large amount of luck attribute, and provides a certain Stamina boost.
recipes.Des$english: Used for gear embedding, grants the gear a large amount of luck attribute, and provides a certain Stamina boost.

NeedMaterial.Name: Starlight  Diamond Lv.3
NeedMaterial.Description: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into a higher-level diamond.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into a higher-level diamond.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare raw stone grown in Regnus, bringing an indescribable sense of opportunity. Like encountering a clear spring in the deep mountains when thirsty. or like picking up a seashell on the beach just before the tide rises. Or perhaps a fragment of a star falling into your palm through the gap between inevitability and chance.

NeedMaterial.Name: Gem Wax
NeedMaterial.Description: A required additive for gem processing.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A required additive for gem processing.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Skillfully crafted by carpenters using natural resin, this material forms a protective film during gem work.

recipes.Name: Gem Wax ×15
recipes.Des: Skillfully crafted by carpenters using natural resin, this material forms a protective film during gem work.
recipes.Des$english: Skillfully crafted by carpenters using natural resin, this material forms a protective film during gem work.

NeedMaterial.Name: Resin
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Versatile in application, it is primarily used to harden and bond leather with lasting strength.

NeedMaterial.Name: Diamond
NeedMaterial.Description: Embedding gems into gear can endow the gear with the unique effects contained in the gems.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Embedding gems into gear can endow the gear with the unique effects contained in the gems.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Finished gem obtained through basic Gemcrafting processing of raw crystal materials. Combines aesthetic appeal with practical utility.

recipes.Name: Diamond
recipes.Des: Used for gear embedding, grants gear a slight luck attribute.
recipes.Des$english: Used for gear embedding, grants gear a slight luck attribute.

NeedMaterial.Name: Starlight  Diamond Lv.1
NeedMaterial.Description: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into diamond.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into diamond.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare raw stone grown in Regnus, bringing an indescribable sense of opportunity.
